description: An eco-friendly campsite along the Rio Claro river, ideal for nature lovers.

payment_options.instructions: Use the QR Code at the entrance for mobile payments.

how_to_arrive_instructions: Head west on Ruta 2. Take the exit at km 284 and follow the gravel road to Rio Claro Campgrounds.

properties.name: Camp Site 1
properties.description: Secluded campsite near the river with a fire pit and picnic table.
properties.pick_up_keys_instructions: No keys required. The campsite is open. Please check-in at the reception upon arrival.

description: A luxury resort with a magnificent view of the mountains and countryside.

payment_options.instructions: Cash payments are accepted at the reception desk.

how_to_arrive_instructions: Take the Ruta 2 highway and exit at km 284. Follow the signs for Cielo Azul Resort.

properties.name: Villa Bella
properties.description: Experience luxury in this exquisite villa with an infinity pool and a panoramic view of the mountains.
properties.pick_up_keys_instructions: Visit the concierge at the main lobby to collect your keys.

description: A family-friendly campsite and lodge in the heart of nature.

payment_options.instructions: We accept all major credit cards.

how_to_arrive_instructions: Take exit 21 from Ruta 2, and follow the signs for Campo del Sol.

properties.name: Lodge One
properties.description: A cozy lodge with a fireplace, perfect for couples or small families.
properties.pick_up_keys_instructions: The keys will be under the doormat. Please lock the door and return them under the doormat when checking out.

description: An exquisite countryside retreat offering a serene and natural atmosphere.
how_to_arrive_instructions: Follow Ruta 2 until km 284. The retreat is located near the old mill.

properties.name: Casa Grande
properties.description: A spacious villa with rustic interiors, private garden, and an outdoor pool.
properties.pick_up_keys_instructions: Pick up the keys at the reception desk upon arrival.

how_to_arrive_instructions: El complejo queda en ruta 2 km 287, cerca del pejae. Yendo para Fray Bentos desde Mercedes a mano izquierda. Aqui esta la ubicacion en google maps: https://goo.gl/maps/R8gQZDHVXr2tiPQA8

properties.name: Cabaña "Sol"
properties.description: Impresionante villa con vistas panorámicas a las montañas. Esta lujosa propiedad ofrece un ambiente tranquilo y relajante con amplios espacios interiores y exteriores. Cuenta con una piscina privada, jardines exuberantes y una terraza para disfrutar de las maravillosas vistas. Perfecta para escapadas en familia o con amigos.
properties.pick_up_keys_instructions: Las llaves se encuentran en un box en la puerta de entrada. La clave para abrir el box es 12345.

properties.name: Cabaña "Luna"
properties.description: Impresionante villa con vistas panorámicas a las montañas. Esta lujosa propiedad ofrece un ambiente tranquilo y relajante con amplios espacios interiores y exteriores. Cuenta con una piscina privada, jardines exuberantes y una terraza para disfrutar de las maravillosas vistas. Perfecta para escapadas en familia o con amigos.
properties.pick_up_keys_instructions: Las llaves se encuentran en un box en la puerta de entrada. La clave para abrir el box es 12345.
